data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module provides Hadamard transforms and Walsh transforms. The
    two are very closely related, but Walsh transforms are more
    frequently used. The name conforms with 00modlist.long.txt where it
    says "Always try to use two or more whole words". Also included are
    routines for converting a Hadamard to a Walsh transform and vice
    versa, for calculating the Logical Convolution of two lists, or the
    Logical Autocorrelation of a list, and for calculating the Walsh
    Power Spectrum - in short, almost everything you ever wanted to do
    with a Walsh Transform.
